item.title: Witkoff in Moscow for peace talks. And, the Voting Rights Act faces new threats
item.description: U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff is in Russia to discuss the war in Ukraine ahead of a deadline for peace. And, today marks the 60th anniversary of the Voting Rights Act, which is facing new threats.

item.title: With $1K in cash aid, he built a life-changing barbershop. Now cash aid is under fire

item.title: Mexican ranchers struggle to adapt as a parasite ravages cattle exports to the U.S.
item.description: U.S. agriculture officials halted live cattle crossing the border in July due to concerns about the flesh-eating maggot which has been found in southern Mexico and is creeping north.
